identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a Telegram-native, dark-mode first Taxi MVP that feels premium, efficient, and trustworthy.

project_scope.app_type: Hybrid Fullstack (Telegram Mini App + Web Admin)

font_family.fallback: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif

mini_app.container: w-full min-h-screen flex flex-col bg-background text-foreground overflow-hidden

components.bottom_sheet: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 bg-surface rounded-t-[20px] p-6 shadow-[0_-4px_20px_rgba(0,0,0,0.4)] z-50 border-t border-white/5
components.map_layer: absolute inset-0 z-0 opacity-60 grayscale-[0.8] invert-[0.9]
components.floating_controls: absolute top-4 right-4 flex flex-col gap-3 z-40

admin_panel.sidebar: w-64 bg-surface border-r border-border flex-shrink-0 hidden md:flex flex-col

buttons.primary: h-12 rounded-xl bg-primary text-primary-foreground font-semibold hover:opacity-90 transition-all active:scale-95 shadow-lg shadow-primary/20
buttons.secondary: h-12 rounded-xl bg-surface_highlight text-white font-medium hover:bg-white/10 transition-all border border-white/5
buttons.ghost: h-10 rounded-lg hover:bg-white/5 text-text_secondary hover:text-white transition-colors
buttons.icon: h-10 w-10 rounded-full bg-surface flex items-center justify-center hover:bg-surface_highlight transition-all

inputs.default: h-12 bg-surface border-transparent focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl text-white placeholder:text-white/30 transition-all

cards.dashboard: p-6 rounded-2xl bg-surface border border-white/5 shadow-sm hover:border-white/10 transition-colors
cards.driver_info: flex items-center gap-4 p-4 rounded-xl bg-surface_highlight/30 border border-white/5

components.status_badge: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

auth_bg.usage: Login screen background with heavy overlay

map_placeholder.usage: Background for 'Searching' state or fallback map

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is WCAG AA compliant. Use text-white on dark backgrounds, text-black on primary/secondary colors.
accessibility.touch_targets: Minimum 44x44px for all interactive elements in Mini App.
accessibility.focus_states: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-primary) for keyboard navigation in Admin Panel.

instructions_to_main_agent: 2. THEME: Force dark mode in 'index.css' by adding the '.dark' class to the html or body tag by default, or ensure the system preference is respected but defaults to dark.
3. MINI APP LAYOUT: Use a 'fixed' positioning strategy for the bottom sheet to ensure it stays accessible over the map.
4. ADMIN LAYOUT: Use a persistent sidebar layout. The main content area should be scrollable.
5. MAP: If no map library is available, use the 'map_placeholder' image as a background with a centered 'MapPin' icon to simulate the experience.
6. DATA-TESTID: Add 'data-testid' to all buttons, inputs, and major containers (e.g., 'submit-order-btn', 'driver-card').
7. SHADCN: Customize shadcn components to match the 'rounded-xl' and 'bg-surface' aesthetic defined in 'components' section. Do not use default white cards.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry and hierarchy.
Micro-interactions: Add 'active:scale-95' to buttons. Add hover states to table rows.
Spacing: Use 'gap-4' or 'gap-6' for lists. Don't crowd the UI.
Glassmorphism: Use the 'glassmorphism' class defined in visual_enhancers for overlays (like the ride status panel).
